A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Definitely succeeded in killing the past complete disregard for the original trilogy. Too many social agendas\, not enough story development. Character inconsistencies. A completely forced love story between Fin and Rose. Didn't get to see Luke as a badass Jedi master. Too much more to mention\, summation\, I won't pay to see anymore stars wars movies. Rian Johnson and Emo Ren succeeded\, childhood dead!
